stray

Multinomial Logistic-Normal Models (really fast)
its a little tar-ball of joy

UPDATE

As of August 2020, due to a naming collision with another package on CRAN. stray has been renamed fido and development is continuing under that name. This respository (stray) is only here for backwards compatability and to serve as a notification of the name change.

Citation

Silverman, JD, Roche, K, Holmes, ZC, David, LA, and Mukherjee, S. Bayesian Multinomial Logistic Normal Models through Marginally Latent Matrix-T Processes. 2019, arXiv e-prints, arXiv:1903.11695
